description: Noodles are dressed in spicy tomato sauce and served with avocado and vegan black bean meatballs in this flavorful southwestern-inspired twist on an Italian classic.
name: Spicy Southwestern Spaghetti with Avocado & Black Bean Meatballs
recipeIngredient: 1/2 large red onion (cut into 3-4 large chunks)
1 jalapeño pepper (seeded (or not, if you like heat)
1 3/4 cups or 1-14 oz. can black beans (rinsed and drained)
1-3 tbsp. cayenne pepper hot sauce (or to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients into food processor bowl and pulse until well chopped and blended, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as needed. Lightly oil a baking sheet. Put on some gloves. Roll mixture into 1 inch balls (you should get about 20) and arrange on baking sheet. Bake 40 minutes, flipping once, about half way through.
